author: Parsifal-2045
body:
#### PR description:

Implement light C++ optimisation for the muon MVA module responsible for selecting high-quality muon seeds in the pixel detector by matching them with L1 Tracker muons:
- Add early return in case either input collection is empty
- Swap std::sort with std::partial_sort

These changes improve the timing of the module by [about 30%](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1460055/contributions/6147459/attachments/2941712/5168585/2024_10_08_thesis_results.pdf#page=20) with no changes in the output. 

#### PR validation:

No changes in the output.
title: Optimise muon seed MVA classifier
